Articles.Content:
Are there any Anomalies on Minmus? Are there Minmoliths?

Discuss.

I personally think, that there are no Anomalies on Minmus because they can be discovered very easily because of very small size of the Planetoid.

Considering that Minmus is so small, I don\'t think it will be too hard to determine whether one exists.

I\'ve found one, actually. But where it is will be somewhat of a surprise ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Seriously, don\'t look in here if you want a surprise!

> 
> 
> 
> 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > > 
> > > It\'s ABOVE the surface. You\'ll have to fly up there, as I did. It isn\'t in orbit. Just floating awkwardly. Note the tattered spacecraft; be careful when playing with .cfg settings. (I tried to remove an RCS thruster that was placed incorrectly 
> > > ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png))
> > > ![cRmLG.png](http://i.imgur.com/cRmLG.png)
> > 
> > 
> > 
>
I\'ve detected one, but I\'m really having trouble pinpointing the location...

> 
> Considering that Minmus is so small, I don\'t think it will be too hard to determine whether one exists.
> 
> I\'ve found one, actually. But where it is will be somewhat of a surprise ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> 
> Seriously, don\'t look in here if you want a surprise!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > > 
> > > > It\'s ABOVE the surface. You\'ll have to fly up there, as I did. It isn\'t in orbit. Just floating awkwardly. Note the tattered spacecraft; be careful when playing with .cfg settings. (I tried to remove an RCS thruster that was placed incorrectly 
> > > > ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png))
> > > > ![cRmLG.png](http://i.imgur.com/cRmLG.png)
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> >

How big is that? It looks huge! ???

Finally! I spent all day getting to it, but it was worth it. I think I deserve a beer ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It\'s the same size as the other ones. 

> 
> [![screenshot6oq.png](http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/6264/screenshot6oq.png)](http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/444/screenshot6oq.png/)
> 
>
I knew there would be one.
Are there any other minmoid anomalies, such as the arch on the Mun?

> 
> Are there any other minmoid anomalies, such as the arch on the Mun?

None, from what I\'ve seen yet.
